attributes.action: scrap the current London Olympic stadium design by HOK Sport and take proposals from architects for a design worthy of the games in 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current design for the London 2012 Olympic stadium is dull, uninspired and unworthy of the upcoming games. The stadium will be the crowning centrepiece for a showcase of Britain across the entire world and its design should display our creativity and achievement as well as any other environmental consideration.
